- Hi Mini -

Proposal: Coding, SEO, Proofreading, Hosting

It was so lovely meeting you and your team today. I just loved hearing about your vision for the Living Library, and I am sure we will be the perfect fit!
Both you and your mom have huge dreams for the Living Library and I can see how it can be quite overwhelming trying to tackle a website alone. Your dreams are a big project and we would like to help you achieve them the best, most professional and most economical way possible.
Because this is such a big project that will keep growing and expanding, it’s best to break your current project down into smaller goals that will be achieved over a few months. What I understood, there will be three phases to your website.
1. Firstly, let’s simply get your website live so it’s easy to find on Google. It’s important that we get your website up as soon as possible so Google bots can find and “read” it. It takes Google about 6 months to find your site, so the sooner we get it online, the sooner it can be found. Your website will have 7 sections: a header, banner (cover photo), downloadable menu, about section + photo, story section + photo, map, contact and footer. This will all go on the index page (home page), and it will be easy to navigate, clean and great for SEO.
2. Second, create an online shopping page for your mum so customers can order her amazing healthy food online.
3. Healthy meal preparation for customers to order pre-made meals. (We don’t need an APP for this. It is very expensive to custom build an APP, so we can do this all on a website.)
Just to be clear, the main page (that we will build and launch first), will still talk about the shop and meal preparations. Customers will be able to contact you to order, but these two products won’t have their own pages yet.
You can download your quote here.
